Reviews.Title: durable * good design
Reviews.Author: ET
Reviews.Content: the box is well made with many openings for wires and the addition of a fan, if required.  there are 4 holes in the bottom to screw the box down to a table or wall shelf.  we built a stand and secured the box to the top.  the box is larger than our DVR so there is ample room for cables in the back and air flow.  i would suggest that the description state FAN NOT INCLUDED.  i looked at so many before buying this one and just assumed it included a fan.  however the description does not state that there is a fan.  on the other hand, most reviewers of other similar boxes state that they do not use the box fan since most DVRs, like ours, has strong fans.  the lock seems well made and so far all is perfect.
